title: "Introduction to Preventive Analgesia: Changing Perception of Pain"
first_phrase: In this text, the concept of pain and its perception are discussed, with the idea that pain is a construct of the mind rather than the body. The text presents the importance of preventive analgesia in managing pain. In the last part (200 tokens), the author introduces the concept of analgesia per differenza, a technique used to induce analgesia by altering the perception of pain. The author guides the reader through the process, which involves inducing a sensation of analgesia and increasing it through specific movements. The reader is advised to engage in the technique to confirm the results.
